mapper.insert: insert into gift_product(giftId,giftName, shopId, publeYear, publisher, cateCode, giftPrice, giftStock, giftDiscount, giftIntro, giftContents) values(NO_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL,#{giftName},#{shopId}, #{publeYear},#{publisher},#{cateCode},#{giftPrice},#{giftStock},#{giftDiscount},#{giftIntro},#{giftContents})
